title: The Wealthy Cow Dung Trick
topic: The Wealthy Cow Dung Trick (East African Tribes)
script: Midwives in some historical East African tribes had the craziest trick for a difficult labor... cow poop! Because cattle were the ultimate symbol of extreme wealth, if a baby was refusing to come out, they would take fresh, incredibly smelly cow dung and pack it all around the birthing bed. They honestly believed the unborn baby could smell the wealth from inside the womb, and would rush out to be born rich! Talk about being born into money. To read the real historic research behind this, check the link in the description.

scenes.prompt: Hyper-realistic portrait photography of a beautiful, heavily pregnant East African tribeswoman in vibrant, colorful traditional beadwork and wrapped fabrics. She looks incredibly exhausted and stressed, lying on a woven mat in a dimly lit rustic hut. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, dramatic shadows, documentary style realism, highly detailed, shot on 35mm lens, photorealistic. No painting.

Hyper-realistic photography of a majestic, highly adorned cow standing proudly in front of a tribal village in the bright sun. The cow is decorated with colorful painted symbols and intricate beadwork collars, symbolizing extreme wealth and prosperity. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, dramatic shadows, documentary style realism, highly detailed, shot on 35mm lens, photorealistic. No painting.

Hyper-realistic portrait photography of a severe, wise older East African midwife carrying a giant, perfectly round, impossibly smelly pile of fresh cow dung on a large green leaf. She looks intensely focused and serious. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, dramatic shadows, documentary style realism, highly detailed, shot on 35mm lens, photorealistic. No painting.

Hyper-realistic portrait photography of a heavily pregnant woman looking completely disgusted and confused, plugging her nose, as the older midwife places the massive pile of cow dung right next to her bed. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, dramatic shadows, documentary style realism, highly detailed, shot on 35mm lens, photorealistic. No painting.
A midwife carrying a giant, smelly pile of fresh cow poop and placing it near the mother's legs. The baby in the womb imagines holding bags of money and rushes out.

Hyper-realistic dream sequence photography of a tiny, adorable newborn baby floating in a golden glowing womb, happily clutching a small burlap sack with a dollar sign on it and dreaming of wealth. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, dramatic shadows, documentary style realism, highly detailed, photorealistic. No painting.

The massive pile of cow dung is still sitting right next to the bed. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, dramatic shadows, documentary style realism, highly detailed, shot on 35mm lens, photorealistic.
